summary: Hatsune Miku is a popular virtual singer and character created by Crypton Future Media. She is a 16-year-old girl with blue twintails, designed as a digital idol. Miku's voice is synthesized using special software, and she performs as a holographic projection at concerts. Her name means "the first sound of the future," as she was the first in Crypton's Vocal Series. She is known for her unique voice, provided by voice actress Saki Fujita, and has inspired many fans to create music and art.
title: Hatsune Miku
